title: Make These Smart Money Moves TODAY & Design Your Ideal Life w/Gino Wickman EP 1225
description:
https://lewishowes.com/abundance2022 - Join My FREE 5 DAY ABUNDANCE CHALLENGE Starting On 2/14/22

Today’s guest is Gino Wickman. He is the founder best-selling author of EOS Worldwide, an organization that implements the Entrepreneurial Operating System Gino developed to help entrepreneurs and leaders get what they want from their businesses. He’s the best-selling author of multiple books including his latest, “The EOS Life.”

In this episode we discuss the key traits of an entrepreneur, the 5 steps to designing your ideal life, why being vulnerable is crucial, the 5 foundational tools for growing a successful business, how to be smart with your money so you don’t end up broke, the 10 disciplines for maximizing your energy, and so much more!

For more go to: www.lewishowes.com/1225

Read Gino's books: https://www.eosworldwide.com/traction-library

Daymond John on How to Close any Deal and Achieve Any Outcome: https://link.chtbl.com/928-pod

Sara Blakely on Writing Your Billion Dollar Story: https://link.chtbl.com/893-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
